üè∑Ô∏è "Nothing makes you imagine that you‚Äôre in a tropical paradise quite like the taste of the sweetest and tangiest mangoes! With this island mango flavour, you‚Äôll absolutely have that thick and sweet syrupy tropical flavour that you get from fresh exotic mangoes!" - [Island Mango (SC) WF](https://www.wonderflavours.com/collections/super-concentrated-flavours/products/island-mango-sc)

​

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1 - 4%

**Single Flavor Test:  4%** 

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

üîπ SNV Test for Intensity/Flavor: 

‚Ä¢ **2%** Medium ‚Äì Noticeable Mango but ‚ÄúMellow‚Äù 

‚Ä¢ **4%** Mod. Strong ‚Äì Fruitier Mango 

‚Ä¢ **6%** Strong but not ‚ÄúBold‚Äù ‚Äì Somewhat Greener Mango Flavor but still ‚ÄúFresh‚Äù. Minor Throat hit. No Identifiable Strong or Strange Off Notes or Mango Mustiness\*

1 Week Steep

2 ¬Ω Week Steep 

​

‚ñ∫Vape: Subtle\* Changes

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural and Ripe. Somewhat Thin\*. Bright & Crisp Mango ‚ÄúJuice‚Äù vs Nectar; with Faint notes of a Green\* Peel. Moderately Light Bodied with an overall Smooth and Clean Mouthfeel. 

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Strong Off Notes 

\- Faint hint of ‚ÄúOverripe‚Äù Qualities on exhale but not easily Identifiable as ‚ÄúSweetness‚Äù dominates

\- @ 2 ¬Ω Weeks Steep Overall Mango\* Flavor is Thinner but still Crisp\* and Intense

\- Not a Creamy Carabao (Champagne) Mango. More akin to a ‚ÄúTommy Atkins‚Äù Mango Juice\*

\- Not Mango Flesh or a Heavy Mango Nectar

‚ñ∫Mixing % Estimate\*
